title: Malvolio trailer
content:
My brother and I just released the trailer for our upcoming movie, Malvolio. You can see it [here.](http://web.archive.org/web/20150424022118/http:/malvolio.apartment32.com/)

- Lex
author: Lex Kominek

comments.content:
P.S. I used Trajan on the site because I thought it might help my chances of getting an Oscar :-)

- Lex
